bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Funds Management is responsible for administering the University's restricted funds. This includes: establishing new funds, endowments, student loans, expendable gifts and building funds; providing stewardship for all restricted funds; preparing annual financial reports for donors; assisting in the placement of gifts in proper accounts; managing the fiduciary responsibility for the University's gift annuities and life income funds; budgeting and distributing endowment income each year and budgeting and monitoring unrestricted and restricted gifts to the operating budget.
